abstract: Driven column review of 2016 Chevrolet Malibu.

headline.print_headline: A Redesigned Chevy Malibu You Can Take to the Beach
headline.main: Video Review: A Redesigned Malibu You Can Take to the Beach

keywords.value: Chevrolet Division of General Motors Corp
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: With its graceful lines, power and balanced ride, 2016’s version of Chevrolet’s midsize sedan is an able competitor in an unforgiving market segment.
lead_paragraph: With its graceful lines, power and balanced ride, 2016’s version of Chevrolet’s midsize sedan is an able competitor in an unforgiving market segment.
